_header: Another day Saint John says us
_description: Gospel ‘fferia va post dominicam terciam quadragesime’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BLHar4196.First Lines: A noþer day saint Ion sais vsGrete puple gedered to ihesus…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And wha in me will trewly tristHertly sal he neuer haue thrist
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Dixit ihesu crist turbis iudeorum operamini & cetera.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Feria v post dominicam terciam quadragesime Secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 49vb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.74-76.
